ValidationRule.description: Ensures mobile or phone provided on converting a lead.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && FirstName <> "Forgotten" && LastName <> "Customer" && IsConverted && NOT( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource, "Purchased List" )) && NOT( RecordType.DeveloperName = "OW_mortgage" ) && ISBLANK(MobilePhone) && ISBLANK(Phone)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mobile and/or phone must be completed.
